title: Black screen rip 13 lp
body: Well uhhh I lost 13lp because of black screen... I dodged 2 games because I couldn't select my champs. Hopefully I can have my lp refunded. Not going to play for a while until this gets fixed because I league never get lp back in situations like this. :/

replies.body: Same thing just happened to me. Now I have a 30 minute ban. FML

If this happened just after accepting the match invite and caused your client to become unresponsive until the dodge occured, then what you experienced is a [**known issue**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/MihNFhcV-black-screen-during-champion-select-beta-client) on the Beta Client. I recommend you swap over and continue to use the Legacy Client for now, to avoid further penalties and occurrences of this. I also recommend send us some League Client logs using the instructions in the post I linked so we can find a solution for the issue much quicker!

We aren't able to fund your LP, unfortunately, as we're locked out of making any changes to your LP for any reason. The system was designed this way to prevent any sort of abuse from occurring.
